name: SAVE 20%! Icegrip Series Offer
description:
All customers are advised to read the Shipping page. 

Get all four Icegrip series plectrums and save 20%! See individual product pages for info.

name: Icegrip Battleaxe VIII
description:
All customers are advised to read the Shipping page. 

My largest model made from an 8mm blank, the Battleaxe VIII offers an even larger weight to the attack with very little physical effort. You can also try using the fatter corners of this pick for a smoother tone great for chordal work. Due to the tapered ergonomic design of Winspear Picks, you will likely find that they feel significantly smaller and less cumbersome than the thickness may imply, with the thickest part of the plectrum being only at the very back. This results in a stronger grip for maximum power transfer and a more relaxed playing experience. This effect is accentuated by the larger designs. For this reason, I would not hesitate to recommend picks such as the Battleaxe VIII to even those inexperienced with other thick picks.

My Icegrip series plectrums are made from UHMWPE (Ultra-high-molecular-weight-polyethylene), offering extreme durability and smooth, effortless playing due to a very low coefficient of friction (significantly lower than that of nylon or delrin/acetal picks). Whilst the edges of Icegrip plectrums are buffed smooth, the grip surface remains slightly textured for improved grip with an almost rubbery feel.

name: Icegrip Battleaxe VI
description:
All customers are advised to read the Shipping page.

name: Icegrip Longsword V
description:
All customers are advised to read the Shipping page. 

The Longsword V is an elongated, sharper take on a traditional sized pick for improved dexterity and accuracy. The thickness of my picks encourages a more relaxed grip whilst delivering a weightier attack with less effort. Whilst this pick is made from a 5mm blank, you will likely find that due to the tapered ergonomic design of Winspear Picks, they feel significantly smaller and less cumbersome than the thickness may imply.

My Icegrip series plectrums are made from UHMWPE (Ultra-high-molecular-weight-polyethylene), offering extreme durability and smooth, effortless playing due to a very low coefficient of friction (significantly lower than that of nylon or delrin/acetal picks). Whilst the edges of Icegrip plectrums are buffed smooth, the grip surface remains slightly textured for improved grip with an almost rubbery feel.

name: Icegrip Dagger V
description:
All customers are advised to read the Shipping page. 

The Dagger V takes a legendary design, sharpening the tip for improved accuracy and applying my thicker, tapered profile for a fatter tone and more relaxed grip. Whilst this pick is made from a 5mm blank, you will likely find that due to the tapered ergonomic design of Winspear Picks, they feel significantly smaller and less cumbersome than the thickness may imply.

My Icegrip series plectrums are made from UHMWPE (Ultra-high-molecular-weight-polyethylene), offering extreme durability and smooth, effortless playing due to a very low coefficient of friction (significantly lower than that of nylon or delrin/acetal picks). Whilst the edges of Icegrip plectrums are buffed smooth, the grip surface remains slightly textured for improved grip with an almost rubbery feel.
